data.text: O God, e zurara nɨ mɨnaba egha nɨn ziam fe.
Kɨ gumazamizir akaba batogha pura uan ziaba febav gɨa ghaze,
Ia uan gavgavibagh nɨghnɨgh da bagh ifaghatan markɨ.
Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn anɨngagharim kamaghɨn iti.
Kɨ uabɨ zurara Jekopɨn God bagh ighiaba bangɨvɨra ikɨ an ziam fam.
Eghtɨ God gumazamizir kurabar gavgaviba bar ada gɨvagham.
